text: Armaan (), the Pakistani Urdu melodramatic black and white movie. It was produced by Waheed Murad and directed by Pervaiz Malik. It was the first Pakistani movie to complete 75 weeks in cinemas and, thus, became the first Pakistani 'Platinum Jubilee' movie. The movie was picturized in black and white prints and in beautiful locations of Karachi. Category:1960s Pakistani movies Category:1966 movies Category:Urdu-language movies
title: Armaan (1966 movie)
